title: PBE Defiantly not ward bug
body: Clicking on the "defiantly not ward" ward skin brings you to moakai. I think the coding is messed up.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report - looks like the ID got swapped here. D:

In the future, please report issues occurring on the PBE on the [PBE Report a Bug section](http://pbr.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/pbe/en_BE/bugReport/create). It helps us better understand where issues are occurring. ^-^
There are the PBE boards and the report a bug feature in the client
